website_summaries.verdict: Same ball that's used for the NCAA men's volleyball championship tournament.
pros: Uses a swirled panel design to allow for a stable flight of the ball after striking it
Microfiber composite cover has a nice feel for optimal control during game play
High-quality construction ensures this ball will last a long time when cared for properly
cons: You'll pay a bit extra for this high-quality ball

customer_reviews.title: I got this volleyball because it's NCAA and Haikyuu!!
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball definitely is different from the Wilson and Mikasas I'm used to. The hexagon shape definitely allows a better grip on the ball, but it just so happens that this version is the exact same ball from Haikyuu!! What do you know?
customer_reviews.author: Toshi Toshioka

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and feel. Concerned about the panels.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel and weight of the ball. My main concern is that the panels are already beginning to split before even being used. One of the white panels is sticking out after the ball was inflated to the proper psi. I usually get quality items through amazon, but this one is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor ball I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor ball I've owned. It has a little more pop than leather balls so it's good for hitting. It has a grippy texture so it's great for setting even when things get sweaty. I don't often have to add air. It's also very durable, I've never before had a ball make it to a third season in such great shape. It cleans up well, after some scrubbing with soap and Bon Ami powder, the white panels are white again. No one complains about it being too hard. It's not as soft as a cheap foam-padded outdoor ball but you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My son made his high school varsity volleyball team and this is the same volleyball they use. I decided to surprise him with one because he practices at home but with a very older volleyball. He was happy I bought it for him. It’s a great quality volleyball. I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase another one when or if I need too. This is such a high quality volleyball, I don’t think I’ll need to unless my son does something to it which would cause an issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect regulation volleyball. I recently started playing volleyball. Learned with a few friends who play regularly. I wanted to practice on my own so I asked what kind I should buy. When we would go to open gyms, I get to try other volleyballs, but the quality and feel just doesn't compare. Sure, I can buy a cheaper ball, but will it feel good when you power through a 3 person block? I have no clue. I'm still learning, I'm still trying to get my timing right when it comes to attacks. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Superior grip makes it easier to control and more forgiving of mis-hits
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely harder than other balls, so passers and defenders don't tend to like it as much. But for setters and hitters, the grip on the ball make it easier to control and way more forgiving than leather or synthetic leather.
customer_reviews.author: ·Dave Cortright

customer_reviews.title: Get this for some nice receives and nice kills!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh this ball is so nice! Coming from the cheaper $25-35 balls, this is amazing. There is a reason why people use it for indoor competition in the US. Great solid feel and forgiving as well with some nice oomph when you slam it down. Nice weight and good size. Solid volleyball all-round. Been using it for at least a few months pretty consistently and it hasn't shown any signs of falling apart or losing it's quality. Loving this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this volleyball. I play regularly a few times a week with some people who played in college. The ball has a really great feel and just enough cushion to make passing bearable and hitting accurate. I bought it after I played a tournament with it. Some people take a few times to get adjusted to it, but I think it's the best volleyball out there right now.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R Edge

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Had some wrinkles in it initially form shipping but a few hours after inflation, they disappeared. I have another Molten ball but I just love the texture of this one so much more. Can't wait until it's a little more broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The outside padding was not glued properly. If you see the pictures there are gaps in the padding and some of the edges are also not glued properly. I will refund this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, really hard.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to open gym but still have not had a game played with it, people think it’s too hard. Tried taking air out, putting air in, but nobody will use. I love the grip though. Overall a nice ball. Makes a scary sound when it hits a gym floor, like it’s goong to break bones when you bump it haha
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The first ball I received has a defect and it was immediately replaced by seller. It is the preferred ball by the high level players. It took a little getting used to compared to the leather volleyballs but it is easier to set and it is aliitle more bouncy than the regular leather volleyballs.
customer_reviews.author: manchester82

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: The description says additional pumping maybe required. We received the ball and we had to do all of the pumping. The ball was completely flat. It says size 5 on the ball, however we thought we were ordering the official size one. The size 5 is not the official size. I do not have time to return the ball to get another as my daughter is required to have her own ball for the volleyball camps and clinics she will start this week due to covid-19. I gave this 3 stars because it was delivered quickly. I do not recommend purchasing this ball if your child plays travel volleyball as it is significantly smaller and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a setter and passer's dream, the grip and feel is unmatched, it is in a league of it's own. It does take a little while to get used to it's feel if you are coming from a different brand. But I adjusted quickly and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best professional indoor ball.
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor ball. By far. Mikasa and wilsons are good and all, but these can't compare. They are for more professional players, and if you're a beginner they will take some adjusting. But the control you get is just amazing, especially as setter. Our club switched to these and never going back. It is sad to see the price keep increasing though, would love to see them settle around $35 like they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Romteni

customer_reviews.title: New standard
customer_reviews.text: This is the standard new ball at the gyms I go to. A bit slicker than the older leather Moltens. This ball seems very hard at higher pressures so you may need to carry your pump to tune depending on the crowd's preference.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pounds

customer_reviews.title: VB
customer_reviews.text: Great VB. It came shipped flat which always makes me concerned for some damage or peeling down the road. I really like the texture and grip of the ball. I went with the international colors so It wouldn't get mixed up as easily when we play with multiple balls.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable indoor volleyball on the market
customer_reviews.text: Friends and I play indoor D1/D2. Love when someone pulls out this ball to play with. Had to get one of my own. Great control and softness. Feels great receiving and passing with this ball. Spiking this ball is a joy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ball
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Ball, Using this 3-4 times a week for about 9-10 months and this ball is holding up very well and staying clean. You bounce this outside and it will get dirty. Recommend this to anyone looking to play indoor no matter your skill level in volleyball. Quality Product and Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It less painful when u pass and more grip for every touches ...
customer_reviews.text: well we'll well, I struggled pumping this ball and there are some lines left on the ball afterward but who cares, everyone on my team would play with ball over any ball, even the pro touch. It less painful when u pass and more grip for every touches u make
customer_reviews.author: David Duong

customer_reviews.title: Pick up games, its everyone's favorite ball
customer_reviews.text: Play pick-up once a week. This ball is the one the group always chooses to use in games. Competitive adult league. Took me a while to convert over from the "old style" leather VB, but now this is our main ball for all games.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for individual practicing and the ball has very nice texture and is amazing for practicing but the biggest problem I found was that the ball looses air just way too quickly. I am not sure if my ball is defected but I have to pump the ball regularly to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashkan

customer_reviews.title: Ball feels fake
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing volleyball for over 10 years and currently play and coach. The ball that Amazon delivered is not genuine. It is too hard, even after I gave it a month to break in, and doesn't bounce like a real Flistatec ball. I do not recommend buying from this seller online.
customer_reviews.author: Yili Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but I use it so much, I even took it to university with me. All my friends love this ball and want one too. I found it from the anime Haikyuu!! Since I'm obsessed with volleyball, but this product is great. Exactly as written, its a great ball with a unique texture that sets it apart from any other volleyball. It's perfect for setting and spiking, but as a libero, it has amazing pop. the sound this ball makes is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Just received today and it looks like its peeling.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the picture are where it looks like the leather is either peeling or short and you can see inside it and see the glue. One of the pics is how it supposed to look like. I just received it today and pumped it with air. Im scared that it wont last long before it peels off
customer_reviews.author: AlohaOi

customer_reviews.title: Had a high expectation, but received a counterfeit unit instead
customer_reviews.text: I have played volleyball for more than 10 years with a variety of volleyballs of different makes. I’m quite sure the unit I received is a counterfeit. The ball has a very stiff core and a thin and slippery exterior. It’s very difficult to play and I stopped using it after playing with it in one game. I’ve since compared it with other friends volleyballs of the exact same model. I could clearly see that they are different, which gave me a good reason to believe that this is a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: an_alligator

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball but didnt last a full season
customer_reviews.text: The ball was great, used it roughly twice a week for league but is already coming apart. It is coming apart at the seam and is basically unusable now in games. The seam opens up and acts like a sail and the ball moves all over the place. For the cost i thought it would last much longer then it did. Will add a photo if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, but different than traditional
customer_reviews.text: Some of the newer balls have been experimenting with different designs and feel. So if you love the old school balls you probably won't like these changes. The outside has a slightly tacky feel (as per the flistatech moniker). Helps with setting a ball, especially a spinning one as that extra grip is noticeable and really a nice feature. The ball feels smaller than traditional balls, I'm not 100% but it really does feel slightly smaller. Brand new it is hard as a rock, it needs some wearing in before it starts to have a nice feel, but will likely never be as soft as say a Tachikara Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: HAIKYUU!!!!
customer_reviews.text: "CHANCE BALL!!!!" -Everyone in that anime Ok... for real though... awesome ball, great feel, great traction, and fun colors. Definitely use indoors primarily, but great to use outdoors if you are confident in keeping the ball up. You are.... arent you? PANCAKES!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ball for Pick Up and Tournament Games
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Molten balls for years and this one is excellent as well. After breaking it in the ball has a good feel to it with just enough stick to play well with it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good and I like the feel of this ball
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good and I like the feel of this ball. I have used it for volleyball and wallyball and it is good for both. This does come uninflated and folded in on itself so it leaves a crease. It also smells heavily of rubber and takes a few days for the smell to leave.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: I do not know if this is an original product
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if this is an original product he came with a marriage and had a terrible smell It seems this is not the original ball.
customer_reviews.author: Big America

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great volleyball. Get a less expensive one if you aren't a serious volleyball player. So far it's been durable and feels great to hit. There's a reason that this ball is the standard for indoor competition.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a real volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: now this is a real volleball! heavy as a real ball should be, the material is amazing and the looks are great also.
customer_reviews.author: Cochalita

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, but was shipped deflated
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this ball, along with the Mikasa MVA200. If you are a setter, the ball's exterior surface (and the MVA200) provides greater control. Compared to the Mikasa MVA200, the ball is a little harder, but I do not consider that a negative. It comes down to a matter a preference. The reason I subtract one star is the ball was received deflated, which caused some creasing. Creasing is not too noticeable when the ball was inflated, but I can still notice it on closer examination. The Mikasa MVA200 ball I ordered previously came partially inflated, so it had no creasing problem.
customer_reviews.author: EWH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ball. Good for competitive games.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Use it for indoor competitive games. Have seen some use and abuse. Holding up really good. Has a nice grip texture, amazing control.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball!! If you play volleyball a lot you’ll love this volleyball ball but if you don’t play a lot then you won’t like it!! Only people who actually understand and know how to play volleyball will realize the quality of a professional ball!
customer_reviews.author: James seguin

customer_reviews.title: Just a little problem maybe factory defect.
customer_reviews.text: The ball its amazing !! I love this ball but it had this problem in the moment I started adding air to the ball. There is something inside of the ball I think it was a rubber that came off of the ball air pump. It dint effect the ball at all but sometimes for me it is really annoying to hear that noise and also feel how that rubber jumps inside of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Obed Robles

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking within one month- got replacement
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking within one month, this is supposed to be a good ball based on the reviews. Not sure how to fix it now. The RL420 sealant that Molten tells to use on their site is not available. Update 7/7/2020: Contacted Molten about the leak and they sent replacement ball immediately. Excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, an improvement on the ProTouch line!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, these new Molten's are ready to use. My old ProTouch (which isn't that old) is still rock hard, as it takes some time for the leather to break in, but the new FLISTATEC balls are good to go. I love the tackiness, they're fun to hit, and they make for some wicked floater serves as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome $ for item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these colors because I can always find them when I'm in a tournament. Same feel as the Red, white and blue Molten's. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Love playing with this ball
customer_reviews.text: Love playing with this ball. It has a good grip - which is strange to some people who are used to a softer ball - but it makes it easier to grip and play. The color also makes it more visible during volleys.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Target Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Deformed straight out of the package
customer_reviews.text: The ball came deformed. After I pumped it up and felt around, I noticed that at some parts of the ball, it's filling my hands differently. Turns out, it's slightly oval shaped. I looked it up a bit, people say there's a chance that it could fix itself after a few plays and/or deflating and repumping due to the inner layer being dislodged and applying proper pressure, but so far, I've had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Chee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated, be aware of that. It is a good ball - a bit stiff at first. Pricey as well but it is a good ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Used 2 weeks and now its leaking around the valve and it won't hold air. Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these balls over the course of my indoor playing days. I typically use connections from coaching friends etc. But after I lost mine at a tourney I figured I would order one on amazon prime. Unfortunately I have used it only a few weeks and there is now a leak around the valve area and the ball will no longer hold air.... very disappointing for a $60 ball ---not sure if they will even allow returns/offer to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: It's a better volleyball I prayed .
customer_reviews.text: It's a better volleyball ball I have played 6 different bands /kinds .How better ? 1. softer .fill comfortable .doesn't hurts my hands . 2, No slipping . Easy to control . 3, It can be played raining or snowing but the leather ball can't .
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for more serious volleyball players.
customer_reviews.text: I'm careful to only use this indoors, because I don't want it to get dirty. But it is a great ball, has a little bit of grip on it because of the texture. Warning that it does not come with anything to inflate with. I was lucky that a friend had something to inflate the ball with, but otherwise a fantastic ball.
customer_reviews.author: S. Raju

customer_reviews.title: These are the best.
customer_reviews.text: My team loves this ball. In fact I ordered more after the fact. The color way is great and easy to follow through the air. I’ll be purchasing even more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Play
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the volleyball and it arrived a couple days before I expected. The ball ships deflated, but doesn't take long to get to the regulation psi. There are creases in the ball due to being shipped deflated, but they're not a major issue. I haven't had a chance yet to use it at my indoor league games, but the ball feels great when running setting drills, and I'm anxious to bust it out at my next game!
customer_reviews.author: NateT

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball, Absolutely Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this volleyball. I play in a adult league that travels around the US, so I am always playing. This ball has been great to play with, it has a perfect amount of grip and can really generate some spin! Always get complimented on it when newer players experience it. It will move different than a more recreational volleyball, meaning more spin and has more grip, but I would highly recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Best volleyball on the market. I do a lot of coed draw tournaments and these balls are becoming increasingly popular! It’s a little adjustment to learn to play with because it’s so bouncy but I’m a big fan
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Incredible grip
customer_reviews.text: The ball is very durable. I play grass volleyball so I stupidly use it outdoors (not recommended). It still is in shape though. It is totally different from any other ball I’ve used. It allows you to have to much set control and the hits and receives are satisfying. Serving is fun because you can try really new things you’ve never tried (jumpserve - easier).
customer_reviews.author: James Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoor ball - I'm an outdoor player but this ball makes me love indoor play
customer_reviews.text: This ball is amazing. Great for setting and serving with amazing GRIP. I like it a bit more than the other "new style" indoor ball, the Mikasa MVA200, which doesn't have quite the same feel. Although players seem to be firmly in one camp or the other. I've only held the Mikasa, not played with it, but I'm a big fan of this Molten.
customer_reviews.author: NerdAlert.TV

customer_reviews.title: great indoor volleyball
customer_reviews.text: it's your basic indoor volleyball. not flimsy or fake/replica. although pricey, it's durable.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Y

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the way the ball is designed along with how durable it is. When ever I purchase this ball, it always last me a good 4-6 months. As I do play volleyball a lot! I always recommend it to others and tell them where they can get it. Absolute best gift and purchase I’ve ever made in my volleyball life.
customer_reviews.author: Alson Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor ball around
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and feel for setting. Love the pop for hitting.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball for Intermediate / Advanced players.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball to play with. Lightweight, and true to flight and form. Doesn't stick to your hands/arms like some of the balls that are out on the market. Great touch and easily picked up on the court. Reminds me of the old rubber molton balls, solid off of your platform when passing. Definitely would recommend for Intermediate to Advanced players, beginners or primarily beach ball players may find this ball a bit "hard", or hard to pass with. But the ball reacts better to harder hit balls and proper passing technique.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Park

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! I got a fake ball from the seller. I tried to contact them about it but got no response. It lasted for about 3 months before the grip started peeling.
customer_reviews.author: John Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Best Indoor Setting Ball I've Played With
customer_reviews.text: Deep in games where people are sweaty and it transfers off to the ball, you still have excellent control setting this ball. Takes a bit of getting used to but the grip of the ball even when it has moisture is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Jorsam

customer_reviews.title: I love this volleyball very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this volleyball very good quality. The only think I would say is I had to return the first one I had because it kept losing air. While that problem was happening they were very supportive and gave me a new one without question. I would definitely recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS WAGNER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for indoor and outdoor volleyball!!! Very durable and soft. I am really happy with my purchase!!! I would highly recommend for volleyball tournaments and trainings!!!🤾🏻‍♀️🤾🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Naki

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball! Grip is great for hitting and hand setting. Some people think it's a little hard for receiving (yes I have let air out of it) but I personally love it all around.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Maheux

customer_reviews.title: These are good volleyballs.  We only use these for our gameplay
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a hole in one, but I'll be getting another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Same ball as used for boys club volleyball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for son#2 and son #1 wanted to take to college with him so had to buy another. Same ball they use with their club teams so they like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hau

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic defects on ball
customer_reviews.text: As others have already mentioned this ball comes deflated which means that there will be permanent creases in some spots in the leather as shown in some other customer pics already. Also the ball I got had part of the "USA volleyball" wording ripped off which looks like it is a very thin plastic glued on the ball. All in all they are just cosmetic defects but spending this much money I would have expected better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good Vollyball, we played with it and nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product and kids like it
customer_reviews.text: great volleyball.. my son and daughter use if for practice at home... its the same as boys club teams use hence the selection of this ball over others
customer_reviews.author: IANO

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I go play open volleyball with a sampling of player provided balls available, usually this one or the green/red FIVB ball is chosen over all the others. Everyone seems to like it or not dislike it, unlike almost every other ball. It's still hard to get over the fact it feels/sounds like you're playing with a high tech rubber playground ball. But, that's because it's space age.
customer_reviews.author: Troy in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great tournament ball!
customer_reviews.text: Awesom tourney ball. Used it in a championship game after breaking it in after half a day, and this is truly a hitters ball. The texture on the ball is easier for the setter too.
customer_reviews.author: giB sineP

customer_reviews.title: Soft Touch, easy on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my sister's ball (same ball), and I'm still satisfied. Many don't like this ball because it is a bit smaller and too grippy but I really like the way the ball touches the skin and moves in the air, both are smooth. The skin of the ball is super soft, that's the best part of the ball. I used my ball for the first time yesterday and no one on the court realized that that was the first time it was inflated (no complaints whatsoever).
customer_reviews.author: Felicia O

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit harder than other balls. But now I prefer this one for the accuracy and quick response. After a year of use it is holding up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael2484

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mind the creases!
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about quality after seeing negative reviews but mine came in great condition. It does arrive deflated and had some creases in it, but honestly, who cares? You buy the ball to play with, not to do a photo shoot. The creases are pretty much nonexistent now.
customer_reviews.author: Banzai Zee

customer_reviews.title: Good ball.
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball. Need to get another cause we play often.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great for competitive indoor play
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing competitive volleyball (including collegiate vb) for over 20 years, and this is my favorite ball of all time. The new design and enhanced texture allows for precision play, especially in the area of overhand passing (setting). While the older Molten volleyballs would become slick after a month or two of regular play, this ball has held up much better, retaining more of its original feel.
customer_reviews.author: BlueAggieFan

customer_reviews.title: Best Volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: This is what the pro's use and everyone on my team always wants to use my ball for games now. Nice softness to it and it holds air well even in changing temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this ball a few times now. The price is cheaper than other places I’ve looked around and it’s exactly what it is. A good volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harp

customer_reviews.title: My favorite indoor ball!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball. It is my second one. By far my favorite indoor ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Berton

customer_reviews.title: Quality volleyball!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality volleyball. I did have a problem with the first one I ordered but after receiving a new one, I haven't had problems since. Great feel and play. Enjoy using this weekly for recreational play and haven't had any complaints!
customer_reviews.author: VCH

customer_reviews.title: Most are good, this recent one is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these volleyballs before through Amazon and typically they are great. The most recent one, however, goes flat and will not stay pumped. After playing one set of one match with it, it becomes unusable because so much air has been lost. It was a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fake Ball.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a good amount of time to get the ball. Once it got to me, i was very excited but as soon as i opened it, i come to find out that it is a replica. Uhmm i guess if you don’t know about volleyball balls you won’t find the difference but i have been playing for years and you won’t fool me.
customer_reviews.author: andre flores

customer_reviews.title: Fast Play, Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: Properly inflated this ball provides fast play, less injury to hands and finger. It will also surprise one with more movement in flight that one would expect compared to balls constructed of leather or other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Christy K

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews about bad termination in the product and I said “” one ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about bad termination in the product and I said “” one in a million “” wish would listen. Great material but the termination is horrible. See pic
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Medina

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Love this ball. Only downside is that all the legit gyms/rec centers keep these in stock and sometimes they grab my ball thinking it's one of theirs. Make sure to write your name/# on your ball if you don't want others claiming it!
customer_reviews.author: George Martinac

customer_reviews.title: Most popular ball for play at A/B level
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, sounds great, hits great! I bought this after playing competitive adult open gyms and seeing half the players carrying this ball with them. It's the one to have and it is first choice for game play.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! My own ball.
customer_reviews.text: The ball was as described. It's exactly like the ones we use in club league just a different color and has us on it. I love it!!! Would buy again and would also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Top Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball. We bought two different kinds at the same time and this one is always asked to be played with first. The pattern helps put some great English on hits. We ended up buying two more of these; o e as a gift the other for a back.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Same as they use at VB practice.
customer_reviews.author: dana lutz

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor volleyball I've played with
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor volleyball I've played with. It takes a little time to break in but once you do you'll realize this is the best indoor ball. In my league this is the only ball we use. It'll take some adjusting at first in your passing since it's a little more bouncy but overall you'll enjoy a much better game/experience.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this volleyball to play some casually competitive volleyball games at my college! A little tough at first, but after a few games it breaks in pretty well. This is by far my by far my favorite ball to play with. It’s grippy, it floats well, and top spin is nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ellefson

customer_reviews.title: Always the ball chosen at Rec
customer_reviews.text: I play twice a week and everyone loves this ball. We have various options including Mikasa top options. I enjoy Mikasa, but this is the ball of choice for me. Great feel, takes a few games to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Best ball I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I go to a play league volleyball, everyone wants to use my ball. I like the texture and color of the ball. It stays inflated and has worked great. No complaints here. Would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of cheap fakes out there so even though I paid a real price, I was afraid I might end up with one of the cheapo China fakes. BIGFLY came thru, the ball is the real deal and just what I was hoping for- it even came faster than expected. Thanks!! :)
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: The ball is great and everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: The ball is great and everyone loves it. Takes some getting used to but anyone who is good at volleyball generally loves this ball. The only problem I had was the ball came deflated and the creases where it was bent haven't fully disappeared yet after 2 weeks. Please stop shipping balls deflated. I will not take any stars off though because it doesn't affect play and because this review is about the ball not how seller ships it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Have had it only for a week, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BALL EVER!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ball! Good feel to it, i think i play much better with this one than any others. Friends all love it and even during league play everyone will ask to use it! Might even buy another as back up :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good ball
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I waited for the price to go down before buying it. It is a good ball, but it has a different feel to it than most other Molten balls. For some reason, it just feels smaller. I usually play with the Molten L2s or Pro Touch balls and this one fares well with it. However, when playing pick up, I occasionally get complaints. I dont know about breaking in the ball... pumping it full of air makes it pretty hard.. So i just leave it a bit deflated for the perfect softness and bouncey level..
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: A bit costly but a great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive ball but its very bouncy, soft to hit and feels quality. I will buy this ball again when I need one ( its been 2 years and mines still holding up tho! )
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: ... this on behalf of my father and he was satisfied. It is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on behalf of my father and he was satisfied. It is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit ball.
customer_reviews.text: This ball lost are the first day we had it and it appeared to be a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: David Layman

customer_reviews.title: ... a few weeks of games and it is a great ball that doesn't "sting" when struck
customer_reviews.text: Break it in with a few weeks of games and it is a great ball that doesn't "sting" when struck. Also useful for fans of Haikyuu!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Teng

product_meta.title: Molten FLISTATEC Volleyball
product_meta.description: The Molten FLISTATEC Volleyball is the official volleyball of USA Volleyball, the NCAA Men's Volleyball Championships, and is FIBA approved - making it the ultimate choice for numerous collegiate conferences and programs across the nation. Expect exceptional, top of the line performance including increased visibility, enhanced flight stability and more accurate overhand passing and sets. By optimizing the air-current around the ball in flight and enhancing grip, Molten's FLISTATEC Flight Stability Technology delivers athletes the control and consistency that they demand with every contact. *Product ships deflated.
feature_bullets: Official Volleyball of the NCAA Men's Championships
For optimal performance, additional inflation may be required. Ball pump not included.
